title: iClue dictionaries (OSX)
description:
iCLUE
*******

Here is all the dictionaries i have found for Clue 
(approx. 180 MB of them).
I added them primarily for use with iClue for OSX, but they can be used by the windows version, too.



HOW TO DO IT:

Download iClue from here (http://hsorbo.no/projects/iclue).
Then open the prog, go in to Preferences and add all the dictionaries.
IClue wanted just the IDX-files, it seemed like. I added all the files anyway...i think the other files are used for the win version.

(There is a win app in the package, but i do not know if it works in XP or Vista.
IT SEEMS that the only reason it doesn&#039;t work in Windows is that the licensing info in the file CLUE.INI is outdated.)



It seems like the dictionaries really cost some bucks: <a href="
http://www.clue-international.com/prices.asp?site=prices" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.clue-international.com/prices.asp?site=prices</a>

I almost felt bad uploading the torrent...i said ALMOST, didn&#039;t i?
It is too late for me to change. The Dark side has taken me   :)

Njoy!


(do not be mad at me, this is my 2nd torrent...or the 1st one that will work..hopefully)

:)
